Title: Chapter One
Subtitle: Strangers To Enemies (Part One)
Synopsis: A housewarming goes sideways when Cody opens the wrong door—and stumbles into a world that shouldn't exist.
Summary: Cody celebrates his first home, drunkenly stumbles through the adjoining door into another world, is healed by strangers, and fixates on the "cosplayer" girl on the other side.

Title: Chapter Two
Subtitle: The Knight Before
Synopsis: Katiya tries to unwind, but duty—and an old flame—won't let her rest.
Summary: Katiya's intro: she struggles to relax, Aldrin frames trainee expectations, and she reconnects with Jullian as they "christen" her new place.

Title: Chapter Three
Subtitle: The Day After
Synopsis: Another soul-numbing office day pushes Cody toward a choice he's not ready to make.
Summary: Cody's bleak office day: roasted for late redlines, awkward beat with Kei, then family unpacking with Miguel queued up for drinks.

Title: Chapter Four
Subtitle: Secondhand Cottage
Synopsis: Nightmares, neighbors, and a base run: Katiya fights panic with routine until routine fights back.
Summary: Katiya's trauma baseline: nightmares of Hillfar; she self-stabilizes, starts her day, meets Derry & Carmen (Rayna foreshadow), and heads to base with Bertram.

Title: Chapter Five
Subtitle: Firsthand Home
Synopsis: Drinks with a best friend turn into confessions—and an idea Cody should ignore.
Summary: Cody + Miguel bro out, drink hard; Miguel crashes, Cody stays up.

Title: Chapter Six
Subtitle: Insurgency
Synopsis: A distant light rattles Gaffesend; Katiya's first day ends with an intruder at home.
Summary: Katiya's first day ends in panic when a distant light (Firebrand tie-in) appears; town responds; on returning home she finds an intruder—Cody—and ambushes him.

Title: Chapter Seven
Subtitle: Exfiltration
Synopsis: Through Katiya's eyes: a door, a modern nightmare, and a blur she can't unsee. and violence.
Summary: Prologue re-seen through Katiya: she crosses into the modern world and recoils, landing back through the door—mirror of Cody's intro.

Title: Chapter Eight
Subtitle: Strangers To Enemies
Synopsis: Misread motives turn their encounter into a full-on clash.
Summary: Third clash: Katiya (assuming Auvryan assassin) and Cody fight to another misunderstanding; she drives him back through the door.

Title: Chapter Nine
Subtitle: Surprise Approach
Synopsis: Cody barricades more than a door as reality refuses to make sense.
Summary: Cody tries to rationalize it away (no wound); barricades the door; nearly late to work; meets foil Reed.

Title: Chapter Ten
Subtitle: Strategic Retreat
Synopsis: A month later, a public moment goes wrong—and Katiya can't shake the blame.
Summary: Katiya cleans to stave off panic, studies Cody's device; time skip: a month later she hesitates during a royal escort, barely averts disaster, is berated, and runs to find Bertram.

Title: Chapter One
Subtitle: Beginning From The End
Synopsis: Titus confronts another inevitable end.

Title: Chapter Eleven
Subtitle: Ennui and Excoriation
Synopsis: Praise falls on the wrong desk. At home, Cody hears a voice on the other side.
Summary: Another month later: Cody is bored while Reed earns praise; Nav spins up a new project; Cody ghosts social invites, but hears pleading through the door at home.

Subtitle: Valedictorian
Synopsis: 36|Reward/The Mask

Subtitle: Snowdrifter
Synopsis: Titus and his friend Romin explore the outer wastes of Blackwater.

Subtitle: Deliverance
Synopsis: The two friends approach the fated location on Titus' map.

Title: Chapter Five
Subtitle: First Blight
Synopsis: An unfathomable scene quickly overrides the premise of their trip.

Title: Chapter Six
Subtitle: Maleficence
Synopsis: Titus presents the results of his expedition at his father's rummage store.

Title: Chapter Seven
Subtitle: Innocence
Synopsis: Titus tends to his lonely younger sister.

Title: Chapter Eight
Subtitle: Solitude
Synopsis: Titus finds an uncomfortable breadth of stillness, but still prefers the cold.

Title: Chapter Nine
Subtitle: Getting Even
Synopsis: There are always consequences for improper uses of Essence.

Title: Chapter Ten
Subtitle: Fellowship
Synopsis: Romin, Valentina, and Sylvia join Titus in one last celebration.

Title: Chapter Eleven
Subtitle: Firestarter
Synopsis: All it takes is one little spark to set the last capital on fire.

Title: Chapter Twelve
Subtitle: Pretense
Synopsis: The fractured Berguard family faces an unspeakable fate.

Title: Chapter Thirteen
Subtitle: Ascension
Synopsis: Titus ascends the foothills of the Afterlife.

Title: Chapter Fourteen
Subtitle: Endogeny
Synopsis: The party discovers a sinister Chymaeran agent.

Title: Chapter Fifteen
Subtitle: First Wall
Synopsis: The fractured group reaches the first inner wall.

Title: Chapter Sixteen
Subtitle: Remember Me
Synopsis: The party can only watch as Romin's ego expends lives.

Title: Chapter Seventeen
Subtitle: Summit
Synopsis: Titus reaches the end of his journey.

Title: Chapter Eighteen
Subtitle: The Grandmaster
Synopsis: Titus encounters Ullrich for a second time.

Title: Chapter Nineteen
Subtitle: Vainglory
Synopsis: Tomorrow marks the advent of a golden age!'

Title: Chapter Twenty
Subtitle: Liquidation
Synopsis: May their souls find rest in the Reservoir.

Title: Chapter Twelve
Subtitle: Anxiety and Avoidance
Synopsis: With help scarce, Katiya runs toward the only lifeline left.
Summary: FOUR WEEK TIME SKIPKatiya, Ryder, and Paxton rescue near-dead Bertram; she's blamed and shut out—her only remaining lifeline is Cody.

Title: Chapter Twenty-One
Subtitle: Premonition
Synopsis: The thread says that none of this was ever a dream.

Title: Chapter Thirteen
Subtitle: The Sleeping Knight
Synopsis: A midnight crossing. A stranger's kindness. Rules they'll both pretend to follow.
Summary: Katiya crosses mid-panic; Cody calms her and lets her sleep; awkward breakfast; they agree to "no interfering" (both intend to break it).

Title: Chapter Twenty-Two
Subtitle: Lyra
Synopsis: Titus makes an abrasive, tentative ally.

Title: Chapter Fourteen
Subtitle: Luddite By Chance
Synopsis: "Welcome to the future." A car ride and a big-box errand become an emotional obstacle course.
Summary: Cody gives her a gentle orientation day: first car ride (terrifying), Costco errand gauntlet—Katiya is overwhelmed by the future.

Title: Chapter Twenty-Three
Subtitle: Strategic Retreat
Synopsis: Titus resists inevitability.

Title: Chapter Fifteen
Subtitle: Technophile By Choice
Synopsis: Cody tours Katiya's world—and fits in a little too well.
Summary: Cody runs Katiya's route in Gaffesend; she tours him as "royal inventor"; awkward Jullian moment; tavern hang where Cody fits in.

Title: Chapter Twenty-Four
Subtitle: Explanation
Synopsis: Titus' friends arrive for answers to his strange behavior.

Title: Chapter Sixteen
Subtitle: Back To Business
Synopsis: A lunch with Dad. A memory of a brother. A door that might be open tonight.
Summary: Cody's spark flickers: nostalgia and lunch with Alan (Jackson talk); he returns hoping for an open door.

Title: Chapter Twenty-Five
Subtitle: Everlasting Moment
Synopsis: Titus lives a near eternity in a single moment.

Title: Chapter Seventeen
Subtitle: Onward To Chaos
Synopsis: Katiya chases a thief and a ghost from her past—while promises tug her toward tomorrow.
Summary: Katiya visits Bertram in the hospital (promises Hillfar); market duty goes sideways; she chases and collars Rayna (Ahkvasan half-blood); Jullian downplays her leap; Cody leaves a treat.

Title: Chapter Twenty-Six
Subtitle: Beneath
Synopsis: It was the only way we could survive.

Title: Chapter Eighteen
Subtitle: Civillian Combat
Synopsis: A training mishap puts Cody on someone important's radar for all the wrong reasons.
Summary: Cody's volunteer training day: Katiya teases, his mistake catches Aldrin's eye; later he chooses friendship over victory in a challenge—character beat.

Title: Chapter Twenty-Seven
Subtitle: Breaking The Habit
Synopsis: Titus sees his father in a different light.

Title: Chapter Nineteen
Subtitle: Warrior Business
Synopsis: Open house at work: new faces, old history, and a wall Cody isn't on.
Summary: Open house at Cody's work: meet Reed & Kei; Cody geeks out, Katiya meets Alan & Kim; they overhear Reed/Kei on Cody missing from the "Future Talent" wall.

Title: Chapter Twenty-Eight
Subtitle: Egress
Synopsis: Snowdrifters drift by steel this time.

Title: Chapter Twenty
Subtitle: Domestic Relations
Synopsis: Double dates, mixed signals, and the uneasy question: are we still who we were?
Summary: Katiya engineers a Cody—Kei date; in parallel she and Jullian go to hot springs and bristle; Cody's date feels off and foggy—he insists he's "fine."

Title: Chapter Twenty-Nine
Subtitle: Slaughter
Synopsis: The survivors realize the ultimate purpose of the unexceptional graduates.

Title: Chapter Twenty-One
Subtitle: Foreign Affairs
Synopsis: Cold water and hard truths—two relationships strain to the breaking point.
Summary: Katiya extracts an uncomfortable truth from Jullian; intercut meltdown date beats (both couples misfire); Cody & Kei hook up but it lands as empty.

Title: Chapter Thirty
Subtitle: Backwoods
Synopsis: The furthest snowdrifitng expedition.

Title: Chapter Twenty-Two
Subtitle: Losing To Fear
Synopsis: Tests expose strengths, flaws, and a calm rival who never seems to miss.
Summary: Katiya passes core exams but shoots poorly; Aryn is unflappable; Cody and Reed clash about what a Level-1 is; Katiya insists on leading the next team exam, feeling off her game.

Title: Chapter Thirty-One
Subtitle: Outpost
Synopsis: There is a stronghold far beyond the limits.

Title: Chapter Twenty-Three
Subtitle: Failing To Launch
Synopsis: A tough room for Cody. A tougher match for Katiya. Plans buckle under pressure.
Summary: Cody presents and gets hammered; Reed's allies redirect the room; Katiya's plan withers, Bertram is "killed" in exercise, she barges the opposing house—bad optics.

Title: Chapter Thirty-Two
Subtitle: Unsettled Glory
Synopsis: They worship themselves in unpaid glory.

Title: Chapter Twenty-Four
Subtitle: Friendly Fire
Synopsis: One wins the crowd; the other loses control. Lines are drawn on both sides.
Summary: Reed's presentation wins; Cody's mild critique is spun as jealousy and he snaps publicly; Katiya loses to Aryn, is told she's below the line, and learns her family's already in Gaffesend.

Title: Chapter Thirty-Three
Subtitle: Craven Denial
Synopsis: The First Red refuse the premise of their purpose.

Title: Chapter Twenty-Five
Subtitle: A House Divided
Synopsis: Back at the house, two people who need comfort get conflict instead.
Summary: Cody spirals home; Katiya waits on his couch; their mutual failures ignite a bitter fight—door slammed shut again.

Title: Chapter Thirty-Four
Subtitle: Deployment
Synopsis: Titus deploys for service with the underachieving classes.

Title: Chapter Twenty-Six
Subtitle: Cold War
Synopsis: Years earlier, in a storm of ice and static, a mission hangs by a thread.
Summary: Jackson's "Operation Bluewings" flashback: drone crash, mission abort, and his sacrificial call to Overwatch in the storm.

Title: Chapter Thirty-Five
Subtitle: Timeless
Synopsis: Titus finds himself deep within the Undercroft.

Title: Chapter Twenty-Seven
Subtitle: Warm Solitude
Synopsis: Long before today, a childhood dare turned into a scar that never closed.
Summary: Katiya's origin trauma: childhood game ? treehouse collapse ? Raph's death; she hides in a corpse pit; the Chymaeran lie brands her forever.

Title: Chapter Thirty-Six
Subtitle: Pulling Punches
Synopsis: Titus contemplates the value of his humanity. A stranger solicits him.

Title: Chapter Twenty-Eight
Subtitle: Prometheus
Synopsis: Small progress, big disappointment—until a late-night spark hints at a dangerous idea.
Summary: Months later: Naveen notes Cody's improvement but deeper ennui; company lunch where Reed is promoted; Reed asks Cody to help fix his flawed prototype (they bond); that night Cody, riding the high, uses Essence as flux—batteries "fire" and spark his next idea.

Title: Chapter Thirty-Seven
Subtitle: No Holds
Synopsis: Titus decides a piece of himself is no longer useful.

Title: Chapter Twenty-Nine
Subtitle: Once Lovers
Synopsis: Family news brightens the table, but Katiya's hands won't stop shaking. A walk with Erik ends at a tavern door—and a choice she should've made months ago.

Title: Chapter Thirty-Eight
Subtitle: Reward/The Vassal
Synopsis: Titus reaches an unexpected end.

Title: Chapter Thirty
Subtitle: Cold Sweat
Synopsis: New alliances form while an ominous email threatens Cody's career.

Title: Chapter Thirty-Nine
Subtitle: Revelation
Synopsis: A vicious enemy unmasks themselves.

Title: Chapter Thirty-One
Subtitle: Heating Up
Synopsis: A collapse, a break-in, and a rescue drag Katiya and Cody violently back together.

Title: Chapter Forty
Subtitle: Forced Rehabilitation
Synopsis: Titus is forced to receive compassion.

Title: Chapter Thirty-Two
Subtitle: Fantastic Modernity
Synopsis: Katiya's first peaceful sleep leads straight into chaotic, sword-filled "fantasy" tourism on Earth.

Title: Chapter Forty-One
Subtitle: Rememberance
Synopsis: Titus recalls the horrors of what his anger set in motion.

Title: Chapter Thirty-Three
Subtitle: Modern Fantasy
Synopsis: Tournament glory and a stolen moment of closeness are shattered with sudden news from the north.

Title: Chapter Forty-Two
Subtitle: Atonement
Synopsis: A powerful ally centers Titus in one final effort.

Title: Chapter Thirty-Four
Subtitle: Professional Death
Synopsis: At work, a meeting becomes a reckoning. Someone steps forward, and the cost is real.

Title: Chapter Forty-Three
Subtitle: Special Pleading
Synopsis: Titus recognizes the strength in his beloved friends.

Title: Chapter Thirty-Five
Subtitle: Physical Demise
Synopsis: Desperation pulls Katiya beyond the walls, where duty, grief, and old ghosts converge.

Title: Chapter Forty-Four
Subtitle: Late Confession
Synopsis: Titus digs deep and confronts one of his fears.

Title: Chapter Thirty-Six
Subtitle: Holding On
Synopsis: Kindness and rediscovery of an old passion dare Cody to care again.

Title: Chapter Forty-Five
Subtitle: Snowdrifters (Plural)
Synopsis: Titus and his plurality of friends explore the outer wastes of Blackwater.

Title: Chapter Thirty-Seven
Subtitle: Letting Go
Synopsis: Shame, buried memories, and unexpected visitors push both worlds toward a new kind of war.

Title: Chapter Forty-Six
Subtitle: Saving Face
Synopsis: Something is different this time. Can you feel it?

Title: Chapter Thirty-Eight
Subtitle: Bottoming Out
Synopsis: This time, Katiya and Cody come together instead of shutting each other out.

Title: Chapter Forty-Seven
Subtitle: Firequencher
Synopsis: They ambush the ambush on future intelligence.

Title: Chapter Forty-Eight
Subtitle: Vermillion Family Reunion
Synopsis: The catgirl crashes back into her neglectul family"s life.

Title: Chapter Forty
Subtitle: Reaching Up
Synopsis: Stories from another road change the map. A cross-world conversation reframes what "winning" could mean.

Title: Chapter Forty-Nine
Subtitle: Tentative Allies
Synopsis: How in Khiras" name did they get together?

Title: Chapter Forty-One
Subtitle: Radio StaticHarsh Noise
Synopsis: An abandoned project stops being a joke.

Title: Chapter Fifty
Subtitle: Reunion/Separation
Synopsis: Titus wishes his story could have ended here, but there is still so much more that needs to be done.

Title: Chapter Forty-Two
Subtitle: Eutectic Point
Synopsis: Turned away by authority, Katiya and her new allies make a plan anyway—three days, no permission, no safety net.

Title: Chapter Fifty-One
Subtitle: Liftoff
Synopsis: The Carmine-Merlot master plan is set in motion.

Title: Chapter Forty-Three
Subtitle: Annealment
Synopsis: Cody raids parts bins and old code; the prototype finally breathes—then crosses into a world where failure isn't theoretical.

Title: Chapter Fifty-Two
Subtitle: Afterlives
Synopsis: What would happen if the Vermillions made it there?

Title: Chapter Forty-Four
Subtitle: In Loving Memory
Synopsis: Cody confronts his father about a resurrected dream.

Title: Chapter Fifty-Three
Subtitle: Rolling Downhill
Synopsis: One of the Vermillion girls tries driving.

Title: Chapter Forty-Five
Subtitle: In Future Grief
Synopsis: Katiya tells her family the whole truth. A journal from the past points her toward who she has to be now.

Title: Chapter Fifty-Four
Subtitle: Purgatory Line
Synopsis: The Lower City converges on the Afterlife.

Title: Chapter Forty-Six
Subtitle: Legacy Hire
Synopsis: Suit pressed, nerves frayed: Cody walks into the room that could end him—or open a door.

Title: Chapter Fifty-Five
Subtitle: Losing My Perfection
Synopsis: Titus takes ownership for a world he was only reborn into.

Title: Chapter Forty-Seven
Subtitle: Liftoff
Synopsis: Proof flies. A name lands. The verdict doesn't.dea.

Title: Chapter Fifty-Six
Subtitle: The Last Firebrand
Synopsis: There is no salvation from failure this time. Titus and his adversary fight through the fabric of time itself.

Title: Chapter Forty-Eight
Subtitle: Oscar Mike
Synopsis: Dawn, a promise, and zero guarantees. The team rolls out while Cody watches the horizon for what no one else believes.

Title: Chapter Forty-Nine
Subtitle: Counter-Strike
Synopsis: Fire buys time—then runs out. A second danger moves where no one is looking.

Title: Chapter Fifty
Subtitle: Apotheosis
Synopsis: Winter arrives with teeth. Something old stirs, and Katiya gets a chance to reconcile the past.

Subtitle: Visions Of Fire
Synopsis: With the city burning, Katiya chooses action.

Title: Chapter Fifty-Two
Subtitle: Parasmagate
